attributes.action: Call for establishment of an International War Crimes Tribunal for the Middle East
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is high time for the international community to begin taking action to procecute the parties involved in the perpatration of war crimes in all mid east conflicts, including but not limited to the OPT's Iraq and Lebanon. 

This would finally call to account the leaders of Israel the United States and the Arab nations who feel they can freely commit war crimes while the international community does nothing.

Therefore we call upon the Prime Minister to urge the Security Council to pass a resolution creating a tribunal to prosecute those found responsible for these crimes
